sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ZL_KHZS_T_MAIN where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ CREATETIME desc /*ORDERBY*/

select.name: type
select.customStr: 一线员工建议,一线员工建议;典型投诉案例,典型投诉案例;金点子,金点子;

if.success: TYPE in (SELECT type FROM ZL_KHZS_T_ADMIN where LOGINNAME = #ADMINLOGINNAME#)

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZSED.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ distinct m.* /*COUNT*/ FROM ZL_KHZS_T_FLOW t , zl_khzs_t_main m where 1=1 and t.vocpid = m.pid $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ m.CREATETIME desc /*ORDERBY*/

if.success: TYPE in (SELECT type FROM ZL_KHZS_T_ADMIN where LOGINNAME = #ADMINLOGINNAME#)

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS_DEPADMIN.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ZL_KHZS_T_DEPADMIN where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ DEPCODE desc /*ORDERBY*/

if.success: DEPTID = ((SELECT pid FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE DEPDNS = (SELECT substr(depdns,0,7) FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE PID = (SELECT DEPID FROM BS_T_SM_USER WHERE LOGINNAME =#userid#))))

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS_YGJYK.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ( select m.pid, m.IDX, m.createtime, m.theme, m.questiontype, m.description, m.dutydept deptname, f.remark2, f.fullname, f.createtime feedtime, f.laststatus, y.remark2 feedappraise, m.remark from zl_khzs_t_main m, (select * from ZL_KHZS_T_FLOW where status = '审核员复核') f, (select VOCPID, remark2 from ZL_KHZS_T_FLOW where status = '关闭') y where f.vocpid(+) = m.pid and m.pid = y.vocpid(+) and m.flowstatus = '关闭' and m.type='一线员工建议' and m.example <> '不公开' and m.example is not null ) where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ FEEDTIME desc /*ORDERBY*/

select.name: deptname
select.sql: select DEPFULLNAME key,DEPFULLNAME value from ZL_KHZS_T_DEPADMIN t

if.success: DEPTID = ((SELECT pid FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE DEPDNS = (SELECT substr(depdns,0,7) FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE PID = (SELECT DEPID FROM BS_T_SM_USER WHERE LOGINNAME =#userid#))))

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS_TSALK.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ( select m.pid, m.IDX, m.createtime, m.theme, m.questiontype, m.description, m.dutydept deptname, f.remark2, f.fullname, f.createtime feedtime, f.laststatus, y.remark2 feedappraise, m.remark from zl_khzs_t_main m, (select * from ZL_KHZS_T_FLOW where status = '审核员复核') f, (select VOCPID, remark2 from ZL_KHZS_T_FLOW where status = '关闭') y where f.vocpid(+) = m.pid and m.pid = y.vocpid(+) and m.flowstatus = '关闭' and m.type='典型投诉案例' and m.example <> '不公开' and m.example is not null
) where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ FEEDTIME desc /*ORDERBY*/

select.name: deptname
select.sql: select DEPFULLNAME key,DEPFULLNAME value from ZL_KHZS_T_DEPADMIN t

if.success: DEPTID = ((SELECT pid FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE DEPDNS = (SELECT substr(depdns,0,7) FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE PID = (SELECT DEPID FROM BS_T_SM_USER WHERE LOGINNAME =#userid#))))

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS_SZALK.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ( select m.pid, m.example, m.IDX, m.createtime, m.theme, m.questiontype, m.description, m.dutydept deptname, f.remark2, f.fullname, f.createtime feedtime, f.laststatus, y.remark2 feedappraise, m.remark, m.is_sketch from zl_khzs_t_main m, (select * from ZL_KHZS_T_FLOW where status = '审核员复核') f, (select VOCPID, remark2 from ZL_KHZS_T_FLOW where status = '关闭') y where f.vocpid(+) = m.pid and m.pid = y.vocpid(+) and m.flowstatus = '关闭'
) where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ FEEDTIME desc /*ORDERBY*/

select.name: deptname
select.sql: select DEPFULLNAME key,DEPFULLNAME value from ZL_KHZS_T_DEPADMIN t

if.success: DEPTID = ((SELECT pid FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE DEPDNS = (SELECT substr(depdns,0,7) FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE PID = (SELECT DEPID FROM BS_T_SM_USER WHERE LOGINNAME =#userid#))))

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS_JDZALK.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ( select m.pid, m.IDX, m.createtime, m.theme, m.questiontype, m.description, m.dutydept deptname, f.remark2, f.fullname, f.createtime feedtime, f.laststatus, y.remark2 feedappraise, m.remark, IS_SKETCH from zl_khzs_t_main m, (select * from ZL_KHZS_T_FLOW where status = '审核员复核') f, (select VOCPID, remark2 from ZL_KHZS_T_FLOW where status = '关闭') y where f.vocpid(+) = m.pid and m.pid = y.vocpid(+) and m.flowstatus = '关闭' and m.type='金点子' and m.example <> '不公开' and m.example is not null
) where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ IS_SKETCH Desc,FEEDTIME desc /*ORDERBY*/

select.name: deptname
select.sql: select DEPFULLNAME key,DEPFULLNAME value from ZL_KHZS_T_DEPADMIN t

if.success: DEPTID = ((SELECT pid FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE DEPDNS = (SELECT substr(depdns,0,7) FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE PID = (SELECT DEPID FROM BS_T_SM_USER WHERE LOGINNAME =#userid#))))

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS_RANKING1.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ( select m.pid, m.IDX, m.createtime, m.theme, m.questiontype, m.description, m.dutydept deptname, f.remark2, f.fullname, f.createtime feedtime, f.laststatus, y.remark2 feedappraise, m.remark from zl_khzs_t_main m, (select * from ZL_KHZS_T_FLOW where status = '审核员复核') f, (select VOCPID, remark2 from ZL_KHZS_T_FLOW where status = '关闭') y where f.vocpid(+) = m.pid and m.pid = y.vocpid(+) and m.flowstatus = '关闭' and m.type='金点子' and m.example <> '不公开' and m.example is not null
) where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ FEEDTIME desc /*ORDERBY*/

if.success: DEPTID = ((SELECT pid FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE DEPDNS = (SELECT substr(depdns,0,7) FROM BS_T_SM_DEP WHERE PID = (SELECT DEPID FROM BS_T_SM_USER WHERE LOGINNAME =#userid#))))

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS_QYESTION.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ZL_KHZS_QUESTION where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ ID desc /*ORDERBY*/

select.name: type
select.customStr: 单选,单选;单选(其他),单选(其他);多选,多选;多选(其他),多选(其他);判断,判断;问答,问答;

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS_QYESTION01.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ZL_KHZS_QUESTION where 1=1 and (BELONGTO = '公有' or (( BELONGTO = '私有') $customwhere2$ )) $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ ID desc /*ORDERBY*/

select.name: type
select.customStr: 单选,单选;多选,多选;判断,判断;简答,简答;单项打分,单项打分;填空简答,填空简答;矩阵填空,矩阵填空 ;

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS_ANNOUNCE.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ZL_KHZS_ANNOUNCE where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ ID desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_QUESTIONALL.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT distinct /*COUNT*/ u.* /*COUNT*/ FROM ZL_KHZS_QUESTION_ALL u ,ZL_KHZS_RELATIONSHIP d where u.ID = d.QUESTIONID $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ u.ID desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_DYWJ.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ZL_KHZS_QUESTIONNAIRE where 1=1 order by /*ORDERBY*/ CREATTIME desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_DYWJ01.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ZL_KHZS_QUESTIONNAIRE where 1=1 $customwhere2$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ CREATTIME desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_DYWJ02.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ZL_KHZS_QUESTIONNAIRE where 1=1 and ISPUBLIC = '公有' or (( ISPUBLIC = '私有') $customwhere2$ ) order by /*ORDERBY*/ CREATTIME desc /*ORDERBY*/
